living_situation: Lives alone in a small apartment in Boston, MA
family_summary: Widowed, with one adult daughter who lives out of state. No siblings, and parents have passed away.
communication_style: Prefers face-to-face communication and appreciates when healthcare providers explain things clearly and patiently. Values empathy and understanding.
primary_motivation: Desire to stay healthy to maintain her independence and be active in her local community garden.
barriers: Limited social contact and occasional feelings of loneliness, which sometimes affect her motivation. Financial constraints due to living on a fixed income.
support_system: Her daughter, who checks in regularly by phone and visits occasionally. A close friend from her local community garden who offers companionship and support.
